title: Craters Of The Moon National Monument & Preserve: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Current Conditions - Craters of the Moon         Alerts    Caution        Navigation  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Navigation  Please do not rely upon digital navigation systems to find your way to Craters of the Moon. Please note that the visitor center & loop drive are located just off of U.S. Highway 20/26/93 (1266 Craters Loop Road) and are not accessed via any dirt roads. more     Information        Campground Closed  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Campground Closed  The Lava Flow Campground is closed for a major renovation project. Please make alternative plans for camping. more          Cave Permits  Alert 2 , Severity ,information ,, Cave Permits  Do not enter any cave without first obtaining a permit from the visitor center or entrance station. To obtain a permit you must not bring any clothing or gear that has been in caves outside of Craters of the Moon over the last 11 years. Thank you! more              Lava Flow Campground is closed for renovation.   Lava Flow Campground is Closed    Find out more about camping outside of Craters of the Moon. To learn more about the Lava Flow Campground renovation project click here.  The Visitor Center is open daily from 8 a.m. until 6 p.m. The physical address for the visitor center is 1266 Craters Loop Road.   The 7-mile Loop Road and all trails are open. Make sure to obtain a permit at the visitor center before entering any cave or spending the night in the Wilderness.
